dict.acceptation: 感觉，官能；意识，观念；理性；识别力；

sent.orig: Selecting either local or remote sense determines where the voltage measurement will be made.
sent.trans: 选择本地取样(Sense)或远地取样决定了在哪里进行电压测量。

sent.orig: Gratefulness boosts your sense of belonging; your sense of belonging in turn boosts your Common Sense.
sent.trans: 感激能提升你的归属感；你的归属感从而又能提示你的常识判断。

sent.orig: Common sense is not sense common to everyone, but sense in common things.
sent.trans: 常识不是人人都有的知识，而是关于常见事物的知识。

sent.orig: Marketing sense + efficiency sense + service sense.
sent.trans: 市场意识+效率意识+服务意识。

sent.orig: Besides, work gives one a sense of fulfillment and a sense of achievement.
sent.trans: 此外，工作给人以充实感和成就感。
